tool.name: Distribute Reads to Targets
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Use a python script to take the BWA output (BAM format) and the raw read files, and then distribute the reads into FASTA files ready for assembly.
.. class:: infomark
The zip file will contain folders with sorted fasta files for each gene that the script could find hits for.
.. class:: warningmark
If there are multiple results (for example, one for each read direction), concatenate them prior to sorting.
